title: KKR to Sell CHI Overhead Doors to Nucor, Generating Windfall for Itself and Employees
sub_head: CHI’s hourly workers will make between $20,000 and $800,000 each before taxes when deal closes
body:
Private-equity giant KKR & Co. aims to make big returns for its investors when it sells a company. Its latest deal will also deliver a serious payout for a different type of investor: the company’s workers.
KKR said Monday it would sell CHI Overhead Doors to steel producer Nucor Corp. for $3 billion including debt.
